data.title: Popularity of Presidents of the French Fifth Republic 2018
data.meta_description: This graph shows the percentage of good opinions towards the successive Presidents of the French Fifth Republic among surveyed in France in 2018.
data.text:
Popularity ranking of Presidents of the Fifth Republic in France 2018

Published by Statista Research Department,

Percentage of good opinions towards Presidents of the French Fifth Republic among French in 2018*

table column chart

CharacteristicShare of good opinions Charles de Gaulle65%Jacques Chirac48%Georges Pompidou47%François Mitterrand39%Valery Giscard d'Estaing33%Nicolas Sarkozy29%Emmanuel Macron20%François Hollande16%

Supplementary notes

* The question was phrased by the source as follows: "Parlons désormais des présidents de la cinquième République française. Dans quelle mesure diriez-vous avoir une bonne ou mauvaise image de chacun des Présidents de la République suivants?"
